name: Mileage Tracker
description:
Mileage Tracker is a lightweight web app that lets you log your trips, track mileage using GPS, and instantly calculate your reimbursement based on your custom rate. Perfect for contractors, delivery drivers, or anyone who travels for work.

✅ Start & end trip with one tap  
📍 Accurate GPS tracking via Google Maps  
📊 Download mileage reports as CSV  
🔐 No logins or data sent to servers  
📱 Works offline and installable as an app

Built to respect your privacy and your time.
